casebody.data:
IN RE: Charles Everette HINTON 449P11-20 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 11, 2018 Mr. Charles E. Hinton, for Hinton, Charles Everette Mr. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th of September 2018 by Plaintiff for Demand for Trial by Jury:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 11th of September 2018."
